title: Republicans struggle to salvage congressional seat in Pennsylvania
text:
Republicans struggle to salvage congressional seat in Pennsylvania 12:56pm GMT - 01:41 
Republicans are scrambling to avoid a political disaster in a conservative district of Pennsylvania, where a pro-gun, pro-union Democrat Conor Lamb who opposes abortion could be about to win a congressional election in one of President Donald Trump's white, working-class strongholds. Lamb is running against Republican Rick Saccone. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
